lead_paragraph: "Follow the thumping" is not what library employees usually say to patrons lost amid the stacks. But on Monday night, as the 2010 Library Lions dinner at the New York Public Library on Fifth Avenue wound up to a throbbing after-party - in hushed halls more used to whispers - guests clinked glasses and shouted above the bass.
snippet: A cross-generational gathering toasts literary lights at the New York Public Library.

headline.main: Nocturnalist | Roaring With Literary Lions, and Cubs

abstract: A cross-generational gathering toasts literary lights at the New York Public Library.
